pullRequest.title: [DOCS] Update community page
pullRequest.bodyText:
Update committers list
Update cn page with latest en page content

Tips

Thank you very much for contributing to Apache Hudi.
Please review https://hudi.apache.org/contributing.html before opening a pull request.

What is the purpose of the pull request
(For example: This pull request adds quick-start document.)
Brief change log
(for example:)

Modify AnnotationLocation checkstyle rule in checkstyle.xml

Verify this pull request
(Please pick either of the following options)
This pull request is a trivial rework / code cleanup without any test coverage.
(or)
This pull request is already covered by existing tests, such as (please describe tests).
(or)
This change added tests and can be verified as follows:
(example:)

Added integration tests for end-to-end.
Added HoodieClientWriteTest to verify the change.
Manually verified the change by running a job locally.

Committer checklist


 Has a corresponding JIRA in PR title & commit


 Commit message is descriptive of the change


 CI is green


 Necessary doc changes done or have another open PR


 For large changes, please consider breaking it into sub-tasks under an umbrella JIRA.

commit.message:
[DOCS] Update community page

- Update committers list
- Update cn page with latest en page content

nodes.bodyText: cn page is simply updated with en page via copy/paste
nodes.diffHunk: @@ -50,26 +50,27 @@ Committers are chosen by a majority vote of the Apache Hudi [PMC](https://www.ap - Great citizenship in helping with all peripheral (but very critical) work like site maintenance, wiki/jira cleanups and so on. - Proven commitment to the project by way of upholding all agreed upon processes, conventions and principles of the community. -### The Committers +### The Team | Image | Name | Role | Apache ID | | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------- | ------------ | -| | [Anbu Cheeralan](https://github.com/alunarbeach) | PPMC, Committer | anchee | -| | [Bhavani Sudha](https://github.com/bhasudha) | PPMC, Committer | bhavanisudha | -| | [Balaji Varadarajan](https://github.com/bvaradar) | PPMC, Committer | vbalaji | -| | [Kishore Gopalakrishna](https://github.com/kishoreg) | PPMC, Committer | kishoreg | -| | [Luciano Resende](https://github.com/lresende) | PPMC, Committer | lresende | -| | [Nishith Agarwal](https://github.com/n3nash) | PPMC, Committer | nagarwal | -| | [Prasanna Rajaperumal](https://github.com/prasannarajaperumal) | PPMC, Committer | prasanna | -| | [Shaofeng Li](https://github.com/leesf) | PPMC, Committer | leesf | -| | [Sivabalan Narayanan](https://github.com/nsivabalan) | Committer | sivabalan | -| | [Suneel Marthi](https://github.com/smarthi) | PPMC, Committer | smarthi | -| | [Thomas Weise](https://github.com/tweise) | PPMC, Committer | thw | -| | [vinoth chandar](https://github.com/vinothchandar) | PPMC, Committer | vinoth | -| | [vinoyang](https://github.com/yanghua) | PPMC, Committer | vinoyang | -| | [Zeeshan Qureshi](https://github.com/zqureshi) | PPMC, Committer | zqureshi |
